meta.description: Month-by-month resale guidance based on platform data and market research

hot_categories.reason: Fitness resolutions drive athletic wear demand through mid-month
Peak winter weather; buyers using holiday gift cards
Post-holiday cozy season; sweater dresses +184% YoY on Poshmark

platform_notes.poshmark: High buyer activity as gift card recipients shop; 67% of sales happen through offers
platform_notes.ebay: Winter clearance searches spike; vintage outerwear in demand

hot_categories.reason: Valentine's jewelry peaks 2 weeks before the 14th, not on the day
Valentine's date night outfits; list by Feb 1
Valentine's gifting
Last chance winter wear clearance pricing

platform_notes.poshmark: Valentine's bundles perform well; use 'gift ready' in titles
platform_notes.etsy: Jewelry and personalized items peak; start promotions early February

hot_categories.reason: Lightweight layering for unpredictable weather
Spring wardrobe refresh; spring apparel peaks March-April on eBay
Spring break travel shopping begins
Transitional footwear

platform_notes.poshmark: Spring cleaning mindset means more buyers browsing
platform_notes.ebay: Vacation wear searches increase; promote calendar items weeks in advance

hot_categories.reason: Easter Sunday outfits
Wedding guest season ramps up; searches up 200%+ on luxury platforms
April showers gear
Mother's Day shopping starts; jewelry sales +116% in 2 weeks before May 12

platform_notes.poshmark: Dress searches peak for Easter; start Mother's Day keywords
platform_notes.ebay: Wedding season items hot; 72% of adults active outdoors spring-summer

hot_categories.reason: Mother's Day gifts peak first week; jewelry biggest category by spend
Graduation ceremonies
Peak wedding guest season
Victoria Day (CA May 19) / Memorial Day (US May 26) kickoff to summer

platform_notes.poshmark: Gift-worthy items with 'ships fast' for Mother's Day; 94% of sales go to active listers
platform_notes.etsy: Mother's Day is third biggest retail holiday; personalized items excel

hot_categories.reason: Father's Day gifts; list by June 1 for shipping buffer
Beach and pool season in full swing
Summer wardrobe essentials
June wedding peak; wedding costs avg $33K USD

platform_notes.poshmark: Vacation bundles sell well; emphasize quick shipping
platform_notes.ebay: Father's Day (June 16) key promotional date; outdoor items trending

hot_categories.reason: Canada Day / 4th of July and peak summer
Summer events and vacations
Back-to-school: 67% of shoppers already buying by July 8 (Prime Day trigger)

platform_notes.poshmark: Start back-to-school listings July 1; NRF reports earliest shopping ever in 2025
platform_notes.ebay: Summer and BTS overlap; list fall preview items late month

hot_categories.reason: Peak back-to-school demand; mid-August through Labor Day
College and professional prep
Fall preview listings - buyers shop ahead
Summer clearance pricing; flash sales to clear inventory

platform_notes.poshmark: Back-to-school drives major traffic; price competitively for student budgets
platform_notes.depop: Vintage peak season Aug-Nov; 'New Fundamentals' trend favors quality basics

hot_categories.reason: Fall layering season; post-Labour Day shopping surge
Fall footwear transition; suede boots +196% YoY
Fall wardrobe refresh
Fall accessories

platform_notes.poshmark: Post-Labor Day shopping surge; fall searches spike
platform_notes.ebay: Fall fashion searches peak; monitor seasonal demand patterns

hot_categories.reason: Halloween costumes and party outfits - sell fast early month
Peak fall/early winter wear; Canadian Thanksgiving drives early demand
Holiday party prep shopping starts
Early holiday gift shopping begins

platform_notes.poshmark: Halloween items sell fast first 2 weeks; start holiday keywords mid-month
platform_notes.ebay: Costume and vintage pieces trend; fall fashion continues strong

hot_categories.reason: Winter weather arrives; cozy items peak
Holiday party season; velvet blazers and knit sets trending
Gift shopping in full swing; use 'gift ready' keywords
Cozy gift items; sweater dresses +184% YoY

platform_notes.poshmark: Black Friday/Cyber Monday huge traffic; list consistently - 94% of sales to active listers
platform_notes.ebay: Gift items with fast shipping win; ground shipping cutoff Dec 15-17
platform_notes.depop: Nov 29 (Black Friday) biggest single day for vintage resale

hot_categories.reason: Last-minute luxury gifts; ship by Dec 15-17 for ground delivery
New Year's Eve outfits sell through Dec 30
Winter essentials and gifts
Cozy holiday gifts

platform_notes.poshmark: Ship fast - ground cutoff Dec 17, express Dec 20-23; use 'ships today' keywords
platform_notes.ebay: Post-Christmas gift card spending creates second wave; prepare January inventory
platform_notes.depop: NYE items sell through Dec 30; archive unsold seasonal items Jan 1
